title: Repo sync

details: Enhanced troubleshooting documentation for insufficient logs, including steps to enable debug logging and create debugging artifacts for CodeQL analysis.
Added details on generating proxy logs for private registry authentication in CodeQL default setup.
Clarified supported registry types (NuGet, GOPROXY, Maven) for Code Scanning default setup and improved setup instructions.
Updated guidance for interpreting logs related to private registry access, including troubleshooting steps.
